articles.content:
Here's some actual breaking news .... breakdancing is now an Olympic sport.
Well, it will be at the 2024 Games in Paris!
The International Olympic Committee says the Olympic competition will featur… [+1325 chars]

articles.title: 'Dumbest play of the year!' - Max rips the Jets for giving up 46-yard TD to the Raiders | First Take - ESPN
articles.description: Max Kellerman rips the New York Jets' defense for using a Cover 0 blitz on Derek Carr's game-winning touchdown pass to rookie WR Henry Ruggs III in the final...
